byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Gives luncheon for Amb Bullitt; urges confidence in Roosevelt's foreign relations conduct, Sen

headline.main: HULL BLOCKS MOVE TO QUESTION ENVOY; Refuses to Delay Bullitt's Return to Paris to Let Him Appear Before House WELLES'S DATA IS SOUGHT Senate Resolution Asking His Attendance Held to Have Little Chance of Adoption
